name: 雪策边境
detailed_description:
[h2] [b] this game developed by chongqing poly cardiac science and technology co., LTD., operations and maintenance. Please respect our labor is successful, friendly games. [/ b] [/ h2]

[h2] [h2] [h2] in this game you can choose the operations carried out on the two sides, divided into orange, blue, the two camps. [/ h2] [/ h2] [/ h2]

[h2] [h2] [h2] the current game version is: 0.0.0.6. [/ h2] [/ h2] [/ h2]
[h2] [h2] [b] [u] communication: 294953571 [/ u] [/ b] [/ h2] [/ h2]


[h2] [h2] [b] [u] game [/ u] [/ b] [/ h2] [/ h2]
Orange, blue, both sides hold the same Arsenal of weapons, for stronghold, players need to hit the designated parts of the enemy players can only be hurt!
Orange, blue, both sides can be occupied the enemy's camp map spot and urban area.
There is a limit to the amount of each player's bullets, such as exhausted to in-game store to purchase the corresponding bullet may continue to use the weapon.

[h2] [h2] [u] [b] [b] players economic access: [/ b] [/ b] [/ u] [/ h2] [/ h2]
As in their own occupation stronghold to fight, will there be a game currency reward every 15 seconds, each click kill sides players will increase the corresponding game currency, point belongs to the games props, can be gotten in certain activities.


[h2] [h2] [b] [u] [b] stronghold occupied rule: [/ b] [/ u] [/ b] [/ h2] [/ h2]
If need to occupy the blue stronghold to orange, then each into blue stronghold fissure generator area of orange party player can provide 100 occupation of contribution to the stronghold.

[h2] [h2] [b] [u] [b] rebirth rules: [/ b] [/ u] [/ b]

Players can be reborn after death on the map with the camp had occupied the stronghold of the reborn inside, rebirth house protected by completely, do not step into others reborn cabin protected area (forgive the green cover).


[h2] [h2] [b] [b] [u] war mode [/ u] [/ b] [/ b]
Conventional war: orange, blue, both sides compete for Kaldi stronghold of the Asia continent (rules: use weapons unlimited, unlimited competitive) ✔.
The subminiature battlefield.




[h2] [b] [b] [u] thank you for your support in this game players! We will do better! Bring you a better experience! [/ u] [/ b] [/ b] [/ h2]

pc_requirements.minimum:
[b]Minimum:[/b]
[list][*][b]OS:[/b] Windows XP Vista8 以上
[*][b]Processor:[/b] I5 - 2380P
[*][b]Memory:[/b] 8 GB RAM
[*][b]Graphics:[/b] GTX 750Ti
[*][b]Sound Card:[/b] Rleaek
[/list]
pc_requirements.recommended:
[b]Recommended:[/b]
[list][*][b]OS:[/b] Windows XP Vista8 以上
[*][b]Processor:[/b] I7 - 7700K
[*][b]Memory:[/b] 16 MB RAM
[*][b]Graphics:[/b] GTX 1080(GTX 1080 Ti) ,GTX2080(GTX 2080 Ti)
[*][b]Sound Card:[/b] Rleaek
[/list]
